full_title: You Sure Love to Ball by Marvin Gaye
title: You Sure Love to Ball
lyrics:
17 ContributorsYou Sure Love to Ball Lyrics[Intro]
*Moaning*

[Verse 1]
Ooh baby, please turn yourself around
Oh baby, so I can love you, girl
Oh baby, I'll make you feel so good
Oh sugar, just like you want me to

[Chorus]
Ooh baby, you sure love to ball
Ooh baby, you sure love to ball

[Verse 2]
Oh honey, I hope you never freeze
I love you, I love you so much
Ooh baby, baby, don't ever go away
Oh, stay with me, baby, I'll love you night and day

[Chorus]
Oh baby, you sure love to ball
Oh honey, you sure love to ball

[Verse 3]
Oh now, I just love you, that's all
I've got my mind made up, baby
And there's no doubts, oh baby
That you're my foxy lady
You might also like[Chorus]
Oh baby, you sure love to ball
Oh sugar, you sure love to ball

[Verse 4]
All, all I know now, baby
Hey baby, is loving you so
Oh, come on in and let me love you
Aw babe, climb the wall

[Chorus]
Oh, oh baby, you sure love to ball
Oh baby, you sure love to ball
Oh, pretty little sexy baby, you sure love to ball
Pretty little sexy mama, you sure love to ball
Pretty little sexy baby, you sure love to ball
Pretty little sexy mama, you sure love to ball
Pretty little sexy baby, you sure love to ball
Pretty little sexy mama, you sure love to ball

[Bridge]
Aw lover, I know
If we ever, ever part
Aw, that one day would surely break my heart
I got to get ready for my baby
[Chorus]
My baby, ooh, you sure love to ball
Oh baby, you sure love to ball, woo
Pretty little sexy, you sure love to ball
Pretty little sexy mama, you sure love to ball, oh
Pretty little sexy baby, you sure love to ball, oh
Pretty little sexy mama, you sure love to ball, woo
Pretty little sexy baby, you sure love to ball
Pretty little sexy mama, you sure love to ball
Pretty little sexy baby, ah, you sure love to ball

[Outro]
Aw, you sure love to ball
Pretty little sexy baby, you sure love to ball, ah
Pretty little sexy mama1Embed
